meta.title: Happy Valentine's, Reeja
meta.tagline: A small world I made for you.

letter.heading: To my mutu
letter.body: Reeja, I wanted to give you something that feels like us, quiet, real, and full of little moments. From the first add, to the first tika on video, to the days we fell asleep on call, you became my home in a way I did not expect. Happy Valentine's Day, my mutu. I choose you, every day.

reasons: You make simple days feel safe.
You love in small ways that stay forever.
You feel like home, even through a screen.
You are brave. You started new chapters.
You are beautiful in every version.
You make me create songs, poems, and dreams.
With you, distance feels smaller than love.

memories.title: The first add
memories.caption: The smallest click that started the biggest change.

memories.title: First time seeing you
memories.caption: That moment when online became real.

memories.title: Godawari, just us
memories.caption: First real us moment, quiet, personal, unforgettable.

memories.title: First song for my mutu
memories.caption: You made me write what I could not say normally.

memories.title: Destiny parking lot
memories.caption: Accidentally meeting again, like the universe nudged us.

memories.title: Our first date
memories.caption: The day maybe turned into this is it.

memories.title: Dinner with my family
memories.caption: My heart was full watching you fit into my world.

memories.title: Personal became personal-er
memories.caption: The day stories started having deeper meaning.

memories.title: A poem for my mutu
memories.caption: Small words. Big feelings.

memories.title: First I love you (voice)
memories.caption: I still remember how real it sounded.

memories.title: Her love letter
memories.caption: The kind of message you do not delete. Ever.

memories.title: First video call
memories.caption: Seeing you live felt like magic.

memories.title: First tika (video)
memories.caption: Distance lost that day.

memories.title: That famous moment
memories.caption: A core memory, private edition.

memories.title: The selfie
memories.caption: One of the most beautiful photos I have ever seen.

memories.title: Childhood photo unlock
memories.caption: Pure side shared. Trust leveled up.

memories.title: Fell asleep on call
memories.caption: Love sounded like breathing and silence.

memories.title: My first gift
memories.caption: I felt so cared for.

memories.title: Makeup photo saved
memories.caption: Yes, I saved it. Of course I did.

memories.title: The yellow dress
memories.caption: Still in my mind like a highlight.

memories.title: First kiss voice note: wana
memories.caption: I smiled like an idiot. Worth it.

memories.title: First kiss video and hand gesture
memories.caption: A signature moment. Only ours.

memories.title: First virtual chess match
memories.caption: I won. Proof is written here. No appeals.

memories.title: First no-filter snap
memories.caption: Real face. Real her. Real love.

memories.title: Sari on video call
memories.caption: Elegant, stunning. I was quiet for a second.

memories.title: Kitchen call, then bathroom call
memories.caption: No distance, no shyness. Just us life.

memories.title: New chapter begins
memories.caption: You chose growth. I am proud of you.

memories.title: 6 hours 58 minutes
memories.caption: We talked all night and slept on call. Love felt easy.

memories.title: Flower on Bhaisipati colony road
memories.caption: A simple gift that stayed loud in my heart.

memories.title: Skirt moment
memories.caption: A new first, and I felt close to you.

memories.title: First movie: Kantara
memories.caption: Kantara, with Teaching Hospital friends.

quiz.question: What time did we add each other first?
Where was our first alone meeting?
What was the first movie you watched after we met?
When was our first video call?
When did you put tika on me (video)?
What color dress do I still remember?
How long was our whole-night call?
Where did you give me the flower?

quizMessages.low: Okay, but you are cute, so forgiven.

coupons: One date fully planned by me. You just show up.
Your favorite curry plus soup day.
Movie night: your pick, no complaints.
One long walk with no phones.

finale.heading: Love Coupons
finale.revealedLine: Mutu, thank you for becoming home to me. I choose you every day.
